content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Salesforce practice is member of EntApps (Enterprise Applications) family and has been successfully delivering its services and top-notch solutions since 2006, revolutionizing the Client business and bringing customer relationship on the next level. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Being a recognized partner of Salesforce EPAM has been marked as a Summit Consulting Partner (former Platinum Consulting Partner) and is part of Advisory Board for Key Salesforce Products. It gives EPAM privilege to be aware of new Salesforce ideas and future product features on the very early stage, help our customers prevent any unnecessary customizations and influence on the products roadmap.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":273168,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/db77551a-22f0-481b-9543-f245d0cdc341/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/db77551a-22f0-481b-9543-f245d0cdc341/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"db77551a-22f0-481b-9543-f245d0cdc341\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1019,\"height\":742.9520414776409},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Salesforce delivery centers are widespread across major regions of Europe, India, North and South Americas giving an opportunity to provide end-to-end services within one time zone of the Client. It should be also mentioned that EPAM has a unique relocation program and ready to assist you with the adaptation in a new country within the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":143682,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b0e523d-8cb6-4ca1-9a26-f56e31cc539a/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b0e523d-8cb6-4ca1-9a26-f56e31cc539a/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9b0e523d-8cb6-4ca1-9a26-f56e31cc539a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1019,\"height\":509.5},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Being among the leaders of Salesforce services providers EPAM ensures the high quality of delivery. Having more than 15 years of Salesforce expertise the practice has built a rich collection of development and consulting templates based on best practices, lessons learnt and modern trends. The desire to bring quality services and business value to the Client results in profound expertise across the full Salesforce spectrum. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":91623,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ed2a3f0c-a076-41b3-9577-e2f72cf450fb/Sf3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ed2a3f0c-a076-41b3-9577-e2f72cf450fb/Sf3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Sf3.PNG\",\"name\":\"Sf3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ed2a3f0c-a076-41b3-9577-e2f72cf450fb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":477.3519855595668},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Salesforce practice provides end-to-end services starting from the assessment/discovery of the business flow, consultancy on the best solution and features to enables, clouds implementation and customization, migration from obsolete/ legacy systems to Salesforce, multiple integrations through middleware and APIs with third-party systems, AppExchange packages development and consulting of other companies on business and security flow, to hyper care support and maintenance. It should be stressed that EPAM Salesforce practice is a recognized member of Salesforce advisory board, which gives EPAM an opportunity to consult Salesforce on the new features development/customization and makes EPAM among the first to try new functionality.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":56224,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e857ef07-6183-444c-87c6-1162aeebe7de/sf4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e857ef07-6183-444c-87c6-1162aeebe7de/sf4.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"sf4.PNG\",\"name\":\"sf4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e857ef07-6183-444c-87c6-1162aeebe7de\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":471.22429906542055},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has successfully delivered its services to more than 800+ customers from a variety of domains: banking and finance, insurance, life science and healthcare, retail and distribution, manufacturing and automotive, ISV and High-tech, etc. A picture is worth a thousand words!   \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":234965,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/36fae17b-703f-4d0f-bcf8-a1134162102e/sf5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/36fae17b-703f-4d0f-bcf8-a1134162102e/sf5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"sf5.PNG\",\"name\":\"sf5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"36fae17b-703f-4d0f-bcf8-a1134162102e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":476.54901960784315},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
